inputs.task: On what date do Article 5 prohibitions start applying?
From when do general GPAI provider obligations apply?
When do most AI Act obligations (general application) start?
From when does Article 6(1) classification and linked obligations apply?
By what date were Codes of Practice initially expected to be ready?
What is the AI Act entry-into-force date?
When do governance provisions (EU/national authorities, notified bodies) start to apply?
When do penalties provisions begin to apply?
Are timelines staggered for prohibitions, governance, GPAI and general obligations?
Do legacy GPAI models have a later compliance horizon than 2025?
Do transparency obligations (Art.50) apply irrespective of high-risk status?
Is Article 6(1) explicitly deferred to 36 months after entry-into-force?
Must Member States operate at least one AI regulatory sandbox within 24 months of EIoF?
Is there an annual review of prohibitions after they start to apply?
Are some LE biometric-ID uses subject to earlier registration requirements?
Is social scoring of natural persons permitted?
Can deployers use AI to exploit vulnerabilities due to age or disability?
Are subliminal or manipulative techniques that materially distort behaviour allowed?
Is untargeted scraping of facial images from the internet to build databases allowed?
Are systems that profile to predict criminality risk from personality traits allowed?
Are biometric categorisation systems inferring sensitive attributes allowed?
Is real-time remote biometric identification in public by LE entirely banned with no exceptions?
Name one lawful exception for LE real-time biometric ID in public.

expectations.answer: Targeted search for a specific missing victim

inputs.task: Name a second lawful exception for LE real-time biometric ID in public.

expectations.answer: Preventing a specific, substantial and imminent threat

inputs.task: Name a third lawful exception for LE real-time biometric ID in public.

expectations.answer: Locating or identifying a suspect of serious crimes listed in Annex II

inputs.task: Must LE complete a FRIA and register before real-time biometric ID in public?
Do prohibitions apply from the EIoF date?
Does consent legalise untargeted facial-image scraping?
May schools use AI emotion recognition on pupils?
May employers use AI emotion recognition on workers?
Does the prohibition include social scoring by public authorities?
Are predictive policing tools that only use profiling data prohibited?
Are systems inferring ethnicity via biometrics prohibited?
Must users be informed when they interact with an AI system (unless obvious)?
Must deployers inform subjects when using emotion recognition?
Must deployers inform subjects when using biometric categorisation?
Must AI-generated image/audio/video deepfakes be disclosed?
Must AI-generated text informing the public on matters of public interest be disclosed?
Are providers required to mark AI outputs in machine-readable form to enable detection?
Is the marking obligation exempted for standard assistive editing that does not alter semantics?
Do transparency duties under Art.50 apply in addition to high‑risk requirements?
Is there a law-enforcement exception to certain Art.50 disclosures?
Must information under Art.50 be provided clearly at first interaction/exposure?
Can the Commission approve Codes of Practice for detection/labelling?
Does editorially controlled public‑interest text avoid the disclosure duty?
Is biometric identification/categorisation listed as high-risk?
Is AI used as a safety component in regulated products high-risk?
Is education/admissions/grading AI high-risk?
Is employment/CV screening/worker management AI high-risk?
Is access to essential private services like credit scoring high-risk?
Is life/health insurance risk assessment and pricing high-risk?
Is migration/asylum/border control risk assessment high-risk?
Is management/operation of critical infrastructure high-risk?
Is a standard customer-support chatbot high-risk by default?
Can providers justify that an Annex III system is not high-risk if insignificant risk per Art.6(2)?
Must high-risk providers complete a conformity assessment before market/use?
Must high-risk systems carry CE marking and an EU Declaration of Conformity?
Must high-risk providers register their system in the EU database before marketing/use?
Is registration for Annex III point 2 systems done at national level?
Are post‑market monitoring plans mandatory for high‑risk providers?
Must serious incidents be reported by high‑risk providers?
Are notified bodies designated to assess certain high‑risk systems?
Must high‑risk systems include automatic logging?
Are data governance and quality controls mandated for high‑risk systems?
Must high‑risk systems ensure effective human oversight?
Must deployers use high‑risk AI according to the instructions for use?
Must deployers ensure human oversight during use of high‑risk AI?
Must deployers keep logs generated by high‑risk AI under their control?
Must deployers inform workers and representatives when high‑risk AI is used at work?
Who must conduct a FRIA before deploying certain Annex III systems?

expectations.answer: Public bodies and certain deployers in Annex III areas (e.g., credit, insurance)

inputs.task: When do FRIA obligations start to apply?
Does FRIA apply to credit scoring of natural persons?
Does FRIA apply to life/health insurance risk assessment and pricing?
Before LE uses real‑time biometric ID in public, is FRIA required?
Should deployers monitor operation and suspend use if unacceptable risk emerges?
Must deployers ensure data processing complies with GDPR/LED where applicable?
Are enhanced human‑verification steps required for certain biometric ID matches?
Which EU body supervises GPAI at EU level?
Must GPAI providers publish a sufficiently detailed training data summary?
Must GPAI providers have a copyright compliance policy (e.g., opt‑outs)?
Do GPAI models with systemic risk face extra evaluation and adversarial testing duties?
What FLOPs threshold presumes systemic risk high‑impact capabilities?
Within how long must a provider notify the Commission after meeting the systemic‑risk condition?
Can Codes of Practice be used to demonstrate GPAI compliance?
Do GPAI obligations apply from 2 Aug 2025?
Do open‑source GPAI models avoid Art.53 unless systemic risk applies?
Can the Commission set common rules if Codes of Practice are inadequate?
May the Commission adjust the FLOPs threshold via delegated acts?
What is the maximum fine for prohibited practices?

expectations.answer: €35,000,000 or 7% of global annual turnover (whichever is higher)

inputs.task: Max fine for supplying incorrect, incomplete or misleading information?
Do SMEs have lower absolute fine caps?
From when do penalty provisions apply?
Can GPAI‑specific breaches face separate fines under Art.101?
Who coordinates GPAI enforcement at EU level?
Are non‑EU providers within scope if they place or use systems affecting the EU?
Can failure to cooperate with authorities trigger fines?
Is there an EU database for (most) high‑risk AI systems?
Must providers register high‑risk Annex III systems in the EU database before market/use?
Are certain law‑enforcement/migration high‑risk systems registered in a secure, non‑public section?
Are high‑risk systems in critical infrastructure registered at national level only?
